description: This file defines a mock class 'ServiceMock' using Google Mock for unit testing. The class mocks an interface for a service with methods covering versioning, paths, state, support, and control operations. It includes external dependencies such as 'Module.h' and 'gmock/gmock.h'.

classes.name: ServiceMock
classes.description: A mock implementation of service interface for unit testing purposes, providing mocked methods for various service operations and properties.

methods.name: Versions
methods.description: Returns the version string of the service.

methods.name: Locator
methods.description: Returns the locator string of the service.

methods.name: ClassName
methods.description: Returns the class name of the service.

methods.name: Callsign
methods.description: Returns the callsign of the service.

methods.name: State
methods.description: Returns the current state of the service.

methods.name: Resumed
methods.description: Indicates whether the service has resumed.

methods.name: IsSupported
methods.description: Checks if a feature or component is supported based on a uint8_t parameter.

methods.name: EnableWebServer
methods.description: Enables the web server with given parameters.

methods.name: SubSystems
methods.description: Returns a pointer to subsystems related to the service.

methods.name: Submit
methods.description: Submits a request with an ID and JSON element.

methods.name: Notify
methods.description: Sends a notification with two string parameters.

methods.name: QueryInterfaceByCallsign
methods.description: Queries an interface by call sign.

methods.name: Model
methods.description: Returns the model string of the service.

methods.name: Background
methods.description: Indicates whether the service is running in background.

methods.name: Activate
methods.description: Activates the service with a given reason.

methods.name: Deactivate
methods.description: Deactivates the service with a given reason.

methods.name: Unavailable
methods.description: Marks the service as unavailable with a reason.

methods.name: Reason
methods.description: Returns the reason for certain state changes.

methods.name: ConfigLine (overloaded)
methods.description: Sets configuration line with a string parameter.
